statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{10 \, x^{3} - 16 \, x^{2} - 11 \, x - 14 , -4 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x + 5 , -6 \, x^{3} + 8 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x + 8 , 18 \, x^{3} - 20 \, x^{2} - 11 \, x - 23 , -2 \, x^{3} - x + 2\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
